description: React component implementing the game board UI for a Tic Tac Toe game, including game state fetching, player interactions, and rendering logic.

methods.name: GameBoard
methods.description: React functional component managing the Tic Tac Toe game UI, including polling game state, handling user moves, and rendering game status.

methods.name: poll
methods.description: Asynchronous function polling the current game state from the server every 2 seconds.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user's click on a game board cell, validates move, and attempts to submit move to server.
